plot outline: Four friends Abhijit,Bhajji,Chandu and Ganesh once while playing cricket Bhajji hits a shot and while running to take the catch Abhijit falls and looses his memory.His doctors say that his memory will return but cant tell when.The friends are more worried because in coming months Abhijit is to be married to Subhalakshmi and he doesn't remember single thing about her.
title: Dokyala Shot
plot: A Marathi boy suffers a head injury which results in him losing his memory. After the accident, his friends find out that he has no clue about his impending marriage.

Four friends Abhijit,Bhajji,Chandu and Ganesh once while playing cricket Bhajji hits a shot and while running to take the catch Abhijit falls and looses his memory.His doctors say that his memory will return but cant tell when.The friends are more worried because in coming months Abhijit is to be married to Subhalakshmi and he doesn't remember single thing about her.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
